Text.Page:
How did the argons corrupt our people with their very presence?

We can fight invaders that take people. But how can we fight an ill wind?

, won't you let Eltarun know you're here to help?

Salutations, ! Auspicious timing.

Contaminated fey abound in this wood, but we can't tell if some are truly corrupted or just naturally violent.

To the north, feral popori wander the wood. Not the civilized kind in your federation or my Mysterium, but ferocious creatures who may or may not be tainted.

I need you to collect some of their blood, so I might analyze their condition.

It's conclusive. They contain the same contaminant we've discovered in the other fey.

I fear no one in Seeliewood will be able to escape this sinister affliction. Curiously, though, it appears particularly virulent with the fey.

The quarry's to the north.

My research is important, and I don't like to be kept waiting.
